LanguageData.INutrientPasteDispenser.label: improved nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.INutrientPasteDispenser.description: The upgraded version of the fine nutrient paste dispenser, it's purple now!
LanguageData.FNutrientPasteDispenser.label: fine nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.FNutrientPasteDispenser.description: Artificially flavored and textured,the nutrient paste dispensed actually tastes pretty good!
LanguageData.PrisonerNutrientPaste.label: prisoner nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.PrisonerNutrientPaste.description: Rusty gears and mold make this a questionable source of food.
LanguageData.ChocoNutrientPaste.label: chocolate paste dispenser
LanguageData.ChocoNutrientPaste.description: using a recycled nutrient paste dispenser, you can create yourself a fine chocolate paste dispenser!
